info.description: Inventory management system API for QwikShelf
info.title: QwikShelf API

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to receive a JWT token
Logout the current user (client-side token removal)

get.description: Returns the profile of the currently authenticated user
Returns a list of all product categories
Returns a single category by ID
Returns inventory levels, optionally filtered by warehouse

post.description: Adjusts stock level for a product variant in a warehouse
Creates an inventory transfer between warehouses

get.description: Returns inventory levels for a specific warehouse
Returns paginated list of all purchase orders

post.description: Creates a new purchase order for a supplier with line items

get.description: Returns all purchase orders for a specific supplier
Returns a purchase order with all its line items and supplier/product details

patch.description: Records partial or full receipt of items in a purchase order
Updates status. When set to 'received', inventory is auto-adjusted.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of product families

post.description: Creates a new product family under a category

get.description: Returns a single product family by ID

delete.description: Deletes a product family by ID

get.description: Returns a paginated list of product variants
Returns a single product variant by ID

delete.description: Deletes a product variant by ID

get.description: Returns a list of all available roles

post.description: Creates a new role with optional permissions

get.description: Returns a single role by ID with its permissions

put.description: Updates an existing role's details and permissions

get.description: Returns a paginated list of suppliers
Returns a single supplier by ID
Returns all product variants linked to this supplier, including product family and location info

post.description: Links a product variant to a supplier with an agreed cost

delete.description: Removes the link between a supplier and a product variant

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided details

get.description: Returns a single user by ID
Returns a list of all warehouses
Returns a single warehouse by ID

BearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token with the `Bearer ` prefix, e.g. `Bearer eyJhbGci...`
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
